derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin accusatorius, from the verb accusare (see accuse) + -al

means.word_mean: 1. specifically indicating a form of prosecution in which one is publicly accused of and tried for a crime and in which the judge is not also the prosecutor
